dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Back in 2024, residents in Astana and Almaty are bracing for some seriously unstable spring weather this week.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And those gusts, up to 24 meters per second in some areas on the 17th? That's intense.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Right, and then temperatures dropping below freezing at night. Like, negative one to negative three Celsius on the 18th? That's practically winter again.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, they're warning about icy roads too. Definitely not the best time for a road trip.

dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, gusts up to 20 m/s again on the 18th and 19th. And daytime temps barely hitting double digits.

dialogue_turns.text: Honestly, it sounds like the kind of weather where you just want to stay in with a hot drink.

dialogue_turns.text: For sure. Kazhydromet really didn't hold back with this forecast—umbrellas and jackets are mandatory.
